```{r}
library(tidyverse)



test_dataset_static %>%
  filter(freq=="Monthly") %>%
  filter(table_name=="gdppr_date") %>%
  filter(Type == "N_distinct_id") %>%
  arrange(date_format) %>%
  summarise(min = min(date_y),
            max = max(date_y)) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c(min,max),names_to="extremum",values_to="year") %>% filter(extremum=="min") %>% pull(year)


```
